artifacts.summary: Supplementary research on MCP servers for Nix (MCP-NixOS), AI best practices, search tools, and documentation resources

next_steps: Run /plan 8 to create implementation plan incorporating both research reports

key_findings: MCP-NixOS (utensils/mcp-nixos) is production-ready MCP server for NixOS package/option data
Multiple Nix-based MCP configuration frameworks exist for declarative Claude Code setup
LLM hallucination of package names is a documented challenge; MCP-NixOS addresses this
Noogle provides comprehensive Nix function search with type signatures
nix-search-cli provides CLI access to search.nixos.org
Recommended: Agent should work without MCP but benefit when available
